A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I have seen this movie Called Star Wars The Last Jedi\, and I have found it insulting.  This isn't Star Wars in my opinion.  Rian Declares his love for Star Wars\, but after watching his responses to the fans dis-satisfaction with his vision\, I am sure that he is lying.  

Rian Gave a Huge Middle finger to the Galaxy that is Far Far away\, discarding established cannon for his own personal interests.  Instead of working within the framework of established understandings and history in world of Star Wars Rian took a self absorbed hammer to it and smashed all logical sense from it.

His stories within the story are weak and draw on the politics of the real world to preach SJW view points to the viewers.  A complete disconnect from ALL known Star Wars movies.

How did Rian get the job of directing this movie?  His portfolio of produced work is anemic and unimpressive in my view.  

All hands - Abandon Ship.. The Star Wars Universe has been Breached with stupidity.  For the love all things. I have NO idea what the hell JJ can do with this mess that Rian left.. but I almost no longer care
